root: ^Royce? I haven't seen you in ages.
^It has been a while, yes. Business, among other things, have kept me away from the village.
^I was shocked to learn my absence was noticed by anyone. Even Asa mentioned it.
^We don't get many outsiders around here. How have you been?
^Trading's been good. If you uh, care to know. I don't think I can complain about more work.
^I've decided to take on more routes as of late. Some unfortunate circumstances have made things harder.
^My wife Teia got sick a bit ago. Nasty cough. We're hoping it isn't anything serious.
^Though it has been what's kept me away. I've been caring for her the best I can.
^But, I can only stay away from work for so long.
^Oh, I remember her! She likes Asa's bread doesn't she?
^Yes. I was hoping to catch her before I leave. Teia would've wanted to come herself but that wasn't possible.
^I know you're not from the village but you do know about the potions I make, right?
^... I do yes. Never been of any interest before though.
^I could help Teia if needed. If it's only a cough then that can be easily fixed.
^Not to say I wouldn't appreciate that Marina but I will be frank. I find the entire witchcraft reliance a bit troublesome.
^That's alright Royce. It was only a suggestion.
^I've only taken more routes to help me afford her medicine. But, if you claim to have a more effective solution. With no strenuous cost at that.
^Then that's settled. I'll be here until I have to return to the city.
^task:A Sickly Wife $Royce $Royce hasn't been to the village lately because of his wife's condition. After he takes this back to her I hope to see them both again next visit!
